newUser: New to SoulFire? Best check the getting started guide, matey!

connect.title: Hoist yer sails to a SoulFire server
connect.description: Choose which kind o' SoulFire vessel ye wish to board, matey.

integrated.title: Ship computer (local)
integrated.description: Runs a SoulFire ship on yer own contraption. All preparations be automatic, no fussin' about needed. (Ye need the Desktop/Android app, aye.)

dedicated.title: Remote server (yonder)
dedicated.description: Sets yer course to a distant SoulFire outpost. Ye must give the port address and secret code o' the outpost.

demo.title: Demo schooner
demo.description: Simulates a make-believe ship with demo cargo. This ship be but for showin', ye can't be changin' a thing aboard.

integrated.preparing: Preparin' to hoist the integrated server...

toast.error: Blimey! Couldn’t start the local server.

integrated.description: The local SoulFire ship runs on yer own deck. Adjust the Java startup riggin' below if need be.

jvmArgs.title: Java VM riggin'
jvmArgs.description: Arguin' with the SoulFire Java engine. To command 4G o' RAM, add <bold>-Xmx4G</bold>. By default, she claims 25% o' yer treasure.
jvmArgs.placeholder: Drop yer own JVM spells here

mobile.description: To set sail on mobile, ye need to do a bit o' handwork first.

termuxCommand.title: Termux spell
termuxCommand.description: Haul in the Termux app, then run this here command in Termux to set up yer SoulFire ship. Then, hoist the generate-token api command to fetch a secret code. Enter yer code below, sailor.

token.title: Token
token.description: Secret code to prove ye belong on this here local ship.

dedicated.description: Type in the port and secret token o' the SoulFire server ye wish to board.

toast.error: Cursed wind! Couldn’t board the server.

token.title: Token
token.description: The code to prove ye belong on this server, matey.

email.title: Parrot mail
email.description: The parrot mail of yer SoulFire account.

emailCode.description: If ye be havin' an account, we've sent a code to <bold>{{email}}</bold>. Feed it in below, matey.

toast.error: That code be no good, ye scallywag.

footer.preview: Seekin' the preview version, are ye?
footer.production: Want to cast off to production waters, do ye?
